doc.field: Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera

Includes: "The Feminist Future" symposium at MoMA, 2 posters (2007); Creative Time: Playing the Building Installation by David Byrne (2008); "Great Power" by Martha Rosler at Mitchell-Innes & Nash (2008); "Agitprop!" by Martha Rosler at Mitchell-Innes & Nash (2015-16); "Inherent Innate Tension" by Lawrence Weiner at Marian Goodman Gallery, 2 posters (2017); "Evolution" by Michal Rovner (2018); "Bialo-Czerivona" by Piotr Uklanski at Gagosian (2008); "Pollock/Benton" by John Baldassari at Marian Goodman (2016); "Miro and Life in General" by John Baldassari at Marian Goodman (2017); Duke Riley at Magnan Metz Gallery (2017); Christopher Wool at Gagosian (2010); "New Capri, Capri, Free Capri" by Mark Grotjahn at Gagosian (2018); Jonas Wood at Anton Kern Gallery (2013); "Equals" by Richard Serra at Gemini G.E.L., 2 posters (2018); Ansel Adams at Detroit Institute of Arts (1980).
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Series I. Single Artist Exhibitions >> Oversize (Set 2)
